testcase.classname: Verify if the user is able to search flight on Air Asia website
testcase.system-out: Given User is navigated successfully to the website "https://www.airasia.com/en/gb".passed And Verify its Title........................................................passed And Click on Flights Icon...................................................passed And Enter Origin as "Bengaluru".............................................passed And Enter Destination as "Pune".............................................passed And Select Depart date as "15/12/2020"......................................passed And Select Return type as "One Way".........................................passed When User clicks on Search Button...........................................passed Then Verify that the user is navigated successfully to search flight page...passed
